oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Laboratory images of frazil ice particles and flocs at different salinities
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schneck, C.C.
Ghobrial, T.R.
Loewen, M.R.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These images are a sample of a larger set of images taken during a laboratory study investigating the effect of salinity on frazil particles and flocs evolution. Frazil and flocs were generated in a frazil tank at the University of Alberta cold room facility. Images of suspended frazil/flocs were taken using cross-polarized light.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
Engineering
frazil particles
frazil flocs
salinities
